title: Thai-Style Dipping Sauce Recipe
full_text:
Thai-Style Dipping Sauce Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
6 servings
Makes
3/4 cup sauce
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
8
teaspoons
finely
minced garlic
(about
8
medium
cloves
)
4
tablespoons
Asian fish sauce
4
tablespoons
fresh juice
from about
4
limes
2
tablespoons
light brown sugar
2
tablespoons
finely
chopped fresh cilantro
leaves and fine stems
1
teaspoon
chile flakes
Directions
Combine garlic, fish sauce, lime juice, brown sugar, cilanto, and chile flakes in a small bowl and stir until sugar is dissolved. Serve.
